casebody.data:
A. B. FRANK CO. v. THE UNITED STATES [No. 45548] [105 C. Cls. 55;

328 U. S. —]

Floor-stocks tax; failure, of taxpayer to present to Commissioner evidence in support of claim for refund.

Defendant’s plea in bar sustained and plaintiff’s petition dismissed.

Plaintiff’s petition for writ of certiorari denied, by the Supreme Court May 27, 1946.
